About This Website

Iâ€™m an advertising student at OCAD University, diving into how creativity, culture, and communication all come together. This website is a collection of my essays, mostly focusing on how culture shapes the world around us. From the impact of mass media to how consumerism affects our identities, my work explores how cultural forces play a huge role in advertising, design, and society. Through these essays, I hope to offer fresh perspectives and deeper insights into culture and how it influences the way we communicate, create, and consume today.
